Welcome to the Internet Job Locator http://www.joblocator.com/ Now Providing Instant NewsGroup Posting ______________________________________________________
Ad # : 7920 Date : August 27 1997 Category : Information Technology Company : New Resources Corporation Position : Progress, Mfg/Pro and Qad Salary Range : competitive salary/bonus/plus more Contact : Ann Neale, Recruiting Manager Phone # : 1-888-520-1400 x 107 Fax # : 216-520-1460 Email Address : aneale9908@aol.com Street Address : 4700 Rockside Road Suite 535 City : Cleveland Country/State : OH Zip Code : 44131
Job Location : Ohio
Fee Req. : No Contract Position : No
Job Description
US-OHIO-PROGRESS, MFG/PRO, AND QAD PROGRAMMER/ANALYSTS NEW RESOURCES CORPORATION
New Resources Corporation is the premier Information Management Consulting firm of Northeast Ohio. We are currently seeking PROGRESS, MFG/PRO, and QAD PROGRAMMER/ANALYSTS with a minimum of two (2) years work experience to join our Cleveland team.
A PLUS: Additional technical experience in either Oracle, Powerbuilder, Visual Basic, MS Access, SQL Server, GUI, Informix.
New Resources Corporation offers: o Full-time salaried positions o Outstanding technical challenges o Career paths o Professional environment o Industry leading compensation o Paid Overtime o Benefits o Matching 401(k) plan
CONTACT: New Resources Corporation Attention: Ann Neale, Recruiting Manager Suite 535 Cleveland, OH 44131 FOR IMMEDIATE CONSIDERATION CALL: Ann Neale at 1-888-520-1400 ext. 107, or FAX 216-520-1460 Attn: Ann Neale, or e-mail to aneale9908@aol.com
Equal Opportunity Employer
_____________________________________________ End Job Post
